title: Pasht Dac'man
contents: property | STR 4, DEX 1, CON 2, INT 0, WIS 1, CHA 0 |
text | Skils: Acro 4, Athl 7, Intim: 3, Lore Orc: 3, Lore War: 3, Med: 1, Nat: 1, Rel: 1, Stl: 4, Sur: 4, Thi: 4
text | Gain 10 + Con HP each lvl
description | Weapons | E: Simple, Martial, Unarmed - T: Advanced
description | Armor | T: Lightt, Medium, Heavy, unarmored

title: Weapons, Armor & Gear
contents: property | Sweep | +1 Hit if is 2nd target
text | Main Inv: Climbing Kit, Dagger, Earplugs, Fishing Tackle, Grappling Hook, Hammer, Splint, Support, Ten-Foot Pole, Tool
text | Backpack: Bedroll, Chalk, Flint and Steel (2), Rope, Soap, Torch, Waterskin

title: Quick Jump
contents: text | High Jump and Long Jump as a single action (don't perform/require Stride).
description | High Jump | Leap Vert (3ft virt + 5ft horiz), DC 30 Athl... CS: inc vert up to 8 or vert5 horiz10, S: Inc vert to 5
description | Long Jump | Leap Horiz (10ft if spd 15+, or 15ft if spd 30+), DC Athl total Leap... S: inc horiz up to SPD

title: Shield Block
contents: property | Reaction Trigger | While you have your shield raised, you would take damage from a physical attack.
text | You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield's Hardness.
text | You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

title: Power Attack
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'>You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> 10th Level | <span style='font-size:8px'>  2 extra dice
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> 18th Level | <span style='font-size:8px'>  3 extra dice

title: Attack of Opportunity
contents: property | Reaction Trigger | A creature within your reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

text | You lash out at a foe that leaves an opening. Make a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If your attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, you disrupt that action. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
